Statements.Statement:
SELECT `ord`.`OrderNo`, `ord`.`RegDt`, `ord`.`ExWorkDt`, `ord`.`BuyerCustCode`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo`, `ord`.`OrderDt`, `ord`.`WorkCustCode`, `ord`.`Description`, `ord`.`Remark`, `ord`.`TermsAndConditions`
FROM `tb_pomaster` AS `ord` WHERE `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `ord`.`DelYn` = 'N'
`ord`.`RegDt` BETWEEN @PeriodFromDt AND @PeriodToDt
`ord`.`ExWorkDt` BETWEEN @PeriodFromDt AND @PeriodToDt
`ord`.`OrderDt` BETWEEN @PeriodFromDt AND @PeriodToDt

SELECT `ord`.`OrderNo`, `ord`.`RegDt`, `ord`.`ExWorkDt`, `ord`.`BuyerCustCode`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo`, `ord`.`OrderDt`, `ord`.`WorkCustCode`, `ord`.`Description`, `ord`.`Remark`, `ord`.`TermsAndConditions`
FROM `tb_pomaster` AS `ord` WHERE `ord`.`OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `ord`.`DelYn` = 'N'

UPDATE `tb_pomaster` SET `RegDt` = @RegDt, `ExWorkDt` = @ExWorkDt, `BuyerCustCode` = @BuyerCustCode, `BuyerPoNo` = @BuyerPoNo, `OrderDt` = @OrderDt, `WorkCustCode` = @WorkCustCode, `Description` = @Description, `Remark` = @Remark, `TermsAndConditions` = @TermsAndConditions, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = NULL, `DeleteDt` = NULL WHERE `OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
UPDATE `tb_pomaster` AS `ord` SET `ord`.`DelYn` = 'Y', `ord`.`DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `ord`.`DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `ord`.`OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

SELECT `ord`.`OrderNo`, `ord`.`DetailId`, `ord`.`ItemGroupCode`, `ord`.`ItemCode`, `ord`.`SeqNo`, `ord`.`ItemNo`, `ord`.`SizeName`, `ord`.`Description`, `ord`.`Qty`, `ord`.`UnitCode`, `ord`.`MarkingColor`, `ord`.`Remark`
FROM `tb_podetail` AS `ord` WHERE `ord`.`OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `ord`.`DelYn` = 'N'

SELECT `ord`.`OrderNo`, `ord`.`DetailId`, `ord`.`ItemGroupCode`, `ord`.`ItemCode`, `ord`.`SeqNo`, `ord`.`ItemNo`, `ord`.`SizeName`, `ord`.`Description`, `ord`.`Qty`, `ord`.`UnitCode`, `ord`.`MarkingColor`, `ord`.`Remark`
FROM `tb_podetail` AS `ord` WHERE `ord`.`OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `ord`.`DetailId` = @DetailId AND `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `ord`.`DelYn` = 'N'

INSERT INTO `tb_podetail` ( `OrderNo`, `DetailId`, `ItemGroupCode`, `ItemCode`, `SeqNo`, `ItemNo`, `SizeName`, `Description`, `Qty`, `UnitCode`, `MarkingColor`, `Remark`, `CompanyCode`, `DelYn`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt` ) VALUES ( @OrderNo, CreateOrderDetailId(@OrderNo, @CompanyCode, @DetailId), @ItemGroupCode, @ItemCode, @SeqNo, @ItemNo, @SizeName, @Description, @Qty, @UnitCode, @MarkingColor, @Remark, @CompanyCode, 'N', @CreateId, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `ItemGroupCode` = @ItemGroupCode, `ItemCode` = @ItemCode, `SeqNo` = @SeqNo, `ItemNo` = @ItemNo, `SizeName` = @SizeName `Description` = @Description, `Qty` = @Qty, `UnitCode` = @UnitCode, `MarkingColor` = @MarkingColor, `Remark` = @Remark, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = NULL, `DeleteDt` = NULL

UPDATE `tb_podetail` AS `ord` SET `ord`.`DelYn` = 'Y', `ord`.`DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `ord`.`DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `ord`.`OrderNo` = @OrderNo AND `ord`.`DetailId` = @DetailId AND `ord`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
